passives.name: BRV Guard Up
passives.desc: Slightly raises DEF when BRV is at least 50% MAX BRV
passives.short_desc: BRV Guard Up: Raises DEF

passives.name: Quick Esuna
passives.desc: Slightly raises turn rate for Esuna
passives.short_desc: Quick Esuna: Raises turn rate of Esuna

passives.name: Bravery Esuna
passives.desc: Slightly raises BRV upon using Esuna
passives.short_desc: Bravery Esuna: Gains BRV

passives.name: Ability Speed Bonus
passives.desc: Slightly raises turn rate during ability chain\n*Also applies to abilities changed from BRV Attack、 HP Attack
passives.short_desc: Ability Speed Bonus: Raises turn rate

passives.name: Charged Cheer
passives.desc: Cheer use +1
passives.short_desc: Charged Cheer: Raises use count of Cheer

passives.name: Charged Esuna
passives.desc: Esuna use +1
passives.short_desc: Charged Esuna: Raises use count of Esuna

passives.name: Starting Veil
passives.desc: Moderately lowers odds of being debuffed for 3 turns at start of each wave
passives.short_desc: Starting Veil: Lowers chance of getting debuffed

passives.name: Quick Cheer
passives.desc: Slightly raises turn rate for Cheer
passives.short_desc: Quick Cheer: Raises turn rate of Cheer

passives.name: Prayers of the Fayth
passives.desc: With at least 50% HP、 KO is avoided and HP drops to 1
passives.short_desc: Prayers of the Fayth: KO is avoided and HP drops to 1 if HP is over a certain amount

passives.name: Buffed Initial Attack
passives.desc: Slightly raises INT BRV、 moderately raises ATK with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buffed Initial Attack: Raises INT BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Esuna Extension
passives.desc: When using Esuna:\n• Slightly increased BRV granted based on INT BRV\n• Extends target's buffs by 1 turn once
passives.short_desc: Esuna Extension: Boost to Esuna

passives.name: Buff Boost Speed
passives.desc: Moderately raises MAX BRV、 SPD with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buff Boost Speed: Raises MAX BRV、 SPD

passives.name: Cheer Extension
passives.desc:
Cheer use +1

When using Cheer:
 • Slight Fayth's Refuge boost
 • Slight boost to BRV granted based on ATK
 • Slightly restores target's HP
 • Granted buff duration +3
passives.short_desc: Cheer Extension: Boost to Cheer

passives.name: Destruction Resonance
passives.desc: Slightly raises party's MAX BRV、 ATK
passives.short_desc: Destruction Resonance: Raises party's MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Initial Attack Extension
passives.desc: When using Initial Attack:\n • Slight raised INT BRV boost\n • Marginal raised ATK boost
passives.short_desc: Initial Attack Extension: Boost to Initial Attack

passive.name: Initial Attack Growth
passive.desc: Initial Attack use +1\n\nInitial Attack effect duration +2
passive.short_desc: Initial Attack Growth: Boost to Initial Attack

passive.name: All Bravery HP Heal
passive.desc: Grants party 20% of individual INT BRV when recovering own HP once per turn
passive.short_desc: All Bravery HP Heal: Increases BRV

passive.name: Enchant
passive.desc: When using Esuna:\n • Debuff removal extended to party

passive.name: Boon of the Fayth
passive.desc:
When using Cheer:
 • BRV granted based on own ATK × 1.5 extended to party
 • Fayth's Refuge boost
 • Party: 5 turns Spira's Blessing、 ATK Up I
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ while Fayth's Refuge active
passive.short_desc: Boon of the Fayth: Boost to Cheer

passive.name: Fayth Resting in Besaid
passive.desc: May equip EX ability Grand Summon
passive.short_desc: Fayth Resting in Besaid: May equip Grand Summon

passives.name: Mighty Grand Summon
passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt with Grand Summon、 Energy Blast
passives.short_desc: Mighty Grand Summon: Increases BRV damage dealt with Grand Summon、 Energy Blast

passives.name: Grand Summon Advance
passives.desc: Slightly raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV when using Grand Summon、 Energy Blast
passives.short_desc: Grand Summon Advance: Raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV when using Grand Summon、 Energy Blast

passives.name: Grand Summon Recast Up
passives.desc: Slightly raises recast speed of Grand Summon
passives.short_desc: Grand Summon Recast Up: Raises recast speed of Grand Summon

passive.name: Fayth Resting in Besaid Extension
passive.desc: Boost to EX ability Grand Summon
passive.short_desc: Fayth Resting in Besaid Extension: Boost to Grand Summon

passives.name: Sonic Wings+
passives.desc: Sonic Wings becomes Sonic Wings+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 4; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; grants allies BRV based on HP damage dealt)
passives.short_desc: Sonic Wings+: Boost to Grand Summon

passives.name: Energy Ray+
passives.desc: Energy Ray becomes Energy Ray+ (moderate BRV damage boost; slightly raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV)
passives.short_desc: Energy Ray+: Boost to Grand Summon

passives.name: Grand Summon All BRV Up Force Advance
passives.desc:
When using Grand Summon、 Energy Blast:
 • Tremendous BRV damage boost
 • Slightly raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV
 • Grants allies BRV based on HP damage dealt
passives.short_desc: Grand Summon All BRV Up Force Advance: Boost to Grand Summon

passives.name: Grand Summon Buff Up Starting
passives.desc:
Slight Valefor's Favor MAX BRV Up、 ATK Up boost

Adds effect to Valefor's Favor granting party HP Regen

6 turns special effect Valefor、 Valefor's Favor at start of quest
passives.short_desc: Grand Summon Buff Up Starting: Boost to Grand Summon; special effect Valefor、 Valefor's Favor at start of quest
